course_name: High Performance Program Management for Coaches
description: A key skill for today's high performance coaches is the management of a high performance sport program which has far broader responsibilities than the traditional role of the coach. This role requires the coach to clearly understand the business environment within which they operate and use contemporary management skills to improve the performance of athletes through effective and efficient program management. This course develops the students knowledge and understanding of key concepts relating to high performance program management including: Strategic & Operational Planning, Resource Management , Financial Management, Marketing, Risk Management and Human Resource Management. The problem based approach allows students to apply knowledge gained in this course to their own coaching practice,
